author: Matt Stieb
title: Trump Walks Back ‘Total Authority,’ Advises Governors to ‘Call Your Own Shots’
description: Trump is once again encouraging governors to take charge in an apparent effort to ditch responsibility if a second wave of outbreaks occurs.
